tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_schedule (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE guerrilla_marketing_initiatives (
  initiative_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  end_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  budget DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_team (
  team_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  team_lead VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  team_size INT NOT NULL,
  start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE GuerrillaMarketingTimeline (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE GuerrillaMarketingCampaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE MarketingSchedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id UUID,
    team_id UUID,
    schedule_date DATE,
    schedule_time TIME,
    status VARCHAR(50)
) ENGINE=InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE Guerrilla_Marketing_Initiatives (
    initiative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Team (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    leader_id INTEGER,
    team_size INTEGER,
    team_description VARCHAR(500),
    FOREIGN KEY (leader_id) REFERENCES Members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Tasks (
    task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    task_description VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
    deadline DATE,
    assigned_to INTEGER,
    task_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (assigned_to) REFERENCES Team(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE,
    report_content TEXT,
    team_id INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Team(team_id)
);
